<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=2072) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 192 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Shadowdancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=77), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Shadow Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2069)

</column>

---

You can focus the shadows into a powerful blast. You can cast [_shadow blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) as an innate occult spell once per day. Its level is always 1 level lower than the level of your shadowdancer focus spells. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.
name: Shadow Power
